 copies a complex image into a TImage (8 b/p) using a logaritmic function or a power function in the gray tone transformation: If (input<Min) output=0, If (input>Max) output=255.

Detailed Description

Kernel ANSI C local operations, last updated 11/30/1999.

These functions are part of the Image Processing Library IPL98.

Version:
0.80
Author:
Ivar Balslev ivb@mip.sdu.dk

Function Documentation

bool k_DrawHistogram (  TImage *    pSource,
TImage *    pDest
) 
 

calculates the histogram of the image *pSource and draws it in *pDest.

The *pDest image has dimensions (w,h,bits)=(277,300,1). If *pSource has 24 b/p the procedure calculates the histogram of the corresponding gray-tone image. The history of *pSource is copied to *pDest, old history in *pDest is deleted.

Parameters:
pSource  is a pointer to the source image
pDest  is the pointer to the destination image
Returns :
False if the source image is empty, *pSource is the same image as *pDest or has less than 8 b/p.
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

bool k_EqualizeHistogram (  TImage *    pSource,
TImage *    pDest
) 
 

transforms *pSource into *pDest using a local pixel value transformation so that the histogram become equalized, the destination image will have same b/p as source image.

If *pSource has 24 b/p the procedure calculates the histogram of the corresponding gray-tone image, and the LUT derived from this is applied so that all rgb-intensities are scaled by the factor (LUT[p]/p) where p is the average of the three intensities.

Parameters:
pSource  is a pointer to the source image
pDest  is the pointer to the destination image
Returns :
False if the source image is empty or has less than 8 b/p.
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 103 of file kernel_local_operation.c.

References TImage::Bits, TImage::Height, TImage::History, k_AddFileAndLine, k_AllocImage(), k_AppendTextIPL(), k_CopyImage(), k_CopyText(), k_EmptyImage(), k_EmptyString(), k_GetPixel24bp, k_GetPixel8bp, k_InitImage(), k_InitString(), k_IplStartHistoryMacro, k_IplStopHistoryMacro, k_PalCreateRGB, k_PalGetBVal, k_PalGetGVal, k_PalGetRVal, k_SetPixel24bp, k_SetPixel8bp, k_ShowMessage(), k_SprintfString(), TImage::Origin, TString::pChars, UINT32, and TImage::Width.

bool k_NonlinearCopyByteToByte (  TImage *    pSource,
float    gamma,
int    Min,
int    Max,
TImage *    pDest
) 
 

copies a TImage (8 b/p) into a TImage (8 b/p) using a logaritmic function or a power function in the gray tone transformation: If (input<Min) output=0, If (input>Max) output=255.

Otherwise: if (gamma==0) output= INT(255*log(input-Min+1)/log(Max-Min+1)), otherwise output = (UINT8)(255*pow((input-Min)/(Max-Min),gamma)). History from pSource is copied to pDest, old history in pDest is deleted.

Parameters:
pSource  is a pointer to the source image
gamma  is the power in the nonlinear converion (logaritmic if gamma==0)
Min  is the value giving zero in *pDest
Max  is the value giving 255 in *pDest
pDest  is the pointer to the destination image
Returns :
False if the *pSource is empty or does not have 8 b/p or if Min>=Max or if
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

Definition at line 229 of file kernel_local_operation.c.

References TImage::Bits, TImage::Height, TImage::History, k_AddFileAndLine, k_AllocImage(), k_AppendTextIPL(), k_CopyText(), k_EmptyString(), k_EmptyText(), k_InitString(), k_IplStartHistoryMacro, k_IplStopHistoryMacro, k_ShowMessage(), k_SprintfString(), TImage::Origin, TString::pChars, TImage::ppMatrix, and TImage::Width.

bool k_NonlinearCopyComplexToByte (  TComplexImage *    pSource,
COMPLEXCHOISE    mode,
float    gamma,
float    Min,
float    Max,
TImage *    pDest
) 
 

copies a complex image into a TImage (8 b/p) using a logaritmic function or a power function in the gray tone transformation: If (input<Min) output=0, If (input>Max) output=255.

Otherwise: if (gamma==0) output= INT(255*log(input-Min+1)/log(Max-Min+1)), otherwise output = INT(255*pow((input-Min)/(Max-Min),gamma))

Parameters:
pSource  is a pointer to the source image
mode  Determines what part of the complex image is to be copied. The values are COMPLEX_REAL, COMPLEX_IMAGINARY, or COMPLEX_MODULUS.
gamma  is the power in the nonlinear converion (logaritmic conversion if gamma==0)
Min  is the value giving zero in *pDest
Max  is the value giving 255 in *pDest
pDest  is the pointer to the destination image
Returns :
False if the *pSource is empty or if Min>=Max
Version:
0.80
Author:
Implemented by Ivar Balslev (ivb@mip.sdu.dk)

bool k_NonlinearCopyFloatToByte (  TFloatImage *    pSource,
float    gamma,
float    Min,
float    Max,
TImage *    pDest
) 
 

copies a float image into a TImage (8 b/p) using a logaritmic function or a power function in the gray tone transformation: If (input<Min) output=0, If (input>Max) output=255.

Otherwise: if (gamma==0) output= INT(255*log(input-Min+1)/log(Max-Min+1)), otherwise output = INT(255*pow((input-Min)/(Max-Min),gamma))

Parameters:

gamma  is the power in the nonlinear converion (logaritmic conversion if gamma==0)
Min  is the value giving zero in *pDest
Max  is the value giving 255 in *pDest
pDest  is the pointer to the destination image
Returns :
False if the *pSource is empty or if Min>=Max

0.80
